idlastro/

tab_create.pro


top source tab_create

tab_create, tcb, tab, maxcol, maxrows, row_len, tb_type

NAME: TAB_CREATE PURPOSE: Procedure to create a new table file.

CALLING SEQUENCE: tab_create, tcb, tab, maxcol, maxrows, row_len, tb_type

OUTPUTS: tcb - table control block for reading from and writing to the file (see tab_open for description) tab - table array

OPTIONAL INPUTS: maxcol - maximum allocated number of columns [default=10] maxrows - maximum allocated number of rows [default=100] row_len - row length in 2 byte units [default=2*maxcol] tb_type - table type 'row' or 'column' ordered

SIDE EFFECTS: Table file is created and left opened to unit number tcb(0,0) for writing.

HISTORY: version 1 D. Lindler Dec. 88 Converted to IDL V5.0 W. Landsman September 1997

Parameters

tcb
tab
maxcol
maxrows
row_len
tb_type
